Art. 4.68. 
Partition with minors or protected persons of full age 
Nevertheless, if the co-heirs include minors or protected persons who, by virtue of article 492/1, ¤ 2, of the former Civil Code, have been declared incapable of alienating property, or other persons referred to in article 1225 of the Judicial Code, the amicable partition is made in accordance with article 1206 of the Judicial Code. The same applies if the succession is accepted with the benefit of inventory.
